body.name: DYPER Viscose from Bamboo Baby Diapers Size 1 | Honest Ingredients | Cloth Alternative | Day & Overnight | Made with Plant-Based* Materials | Hypoallergenic for Sensitive Newborn Skin, Unscented
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 13 hrs 49 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed. The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: KIND TO BABY: Experience plant-based* disposable diapers designed for sensitive newborn, preemie, and toddler skin. Outer and inner layers are made with 100% Viscose from Bamboo for improved comfort, superior wicking, and maximum fluid retention.

STRETCHY, SOFT, COMFORTABLE: Remarkably soft to the touch, absorbent, and thoughtfully made with honest ingredients. They feel more like yoga-pants than conventional diapers with an almost underwear-like fit.

ABSORBENT, SAFE, VERSATILE: Certified to the highest OEKO-TEX consumer safety standards. Clinically tested and 5-star rated by dermatologists. Great as a cloth diaper alternative, for potty training boys & girls, nighttime protection, and swaddler time.

RESPONSIBLE & MADE WITH PLANT-BASED* MATERIALS: Our infant diapers are parent’s choice because they are made without chlorine, latex, alcohol, perfumes, PVC, lotions, TBT, parabens, sulphates, & phthalates. They are unprinted, unscented, hypoallergenic, and cruelty-free to protect the next generation.
Each package contains 36 Size 1 (Extra Small) diapers for babies 8-14 lb.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best diapers ever!!
reviews.reviewText: I love this brand! Super soft and absorbent!!! Love the no print on them too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Serious let down-AMENDED!
reviews.reviewText: EDIT- I have to eat my words from earlier. We’ve been solely using these diapers for his whole life (6 months) and they are amazing and wonderful and I can’t sing their praises enough. Not to mention- the company is incredible with customer service! The trick here is your baby will size out of these like a thief in the night- don’t know how to else to describe it. It seems to fit fine but it just doesn’t- you have to size up pretty early, earlier than the weight stated per size in my experience. As long as you do this they work like a dream!I was so excited to use these for my new baby. I try to be as eco-conscious as possible and avoid a lot of the toxic ingredients found in just about every single thing they sell is in America. This brand has made a step in the right direction as far as safety of ingredients and the capability of these diapers to break down naturally! I thought for sure I’d use these the whole time for my baby. HOWEVER…These diapers leak everywhere. Any time I put one on my baby he ends up covered in a mess. They do run bigger so I waited a couple weeks for him to even be able to wear the newborn size but even now they do not hold anything in. I’m so sad, I really wanted to love these. The idea is wonderful, as is the softness and I love that they don’t use ink and are plain white- but the functionality is just not there and I can’t possibly use them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These diapers are great! Sizing is accurate. We’ve not really had any leakage issues. I also appreciate they are more friendly to the earth!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dyper is awesome!
reviews.reviewText: They fit very well and no leaks and are soft

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the quality, but expensive
reviews.reviewText: I love the quality and nontoxic properties of those diapers, but too expensive for us unfortunately. They are super absorbent, we used them for over month without any leaks. They are also soft, but not as soft as other competitors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The worst diapers I’ve ever used
reviews.reviewText: These diapers are the worst diapers I have ever used. They literally just leak pee right through them. It is as if my baby is just wearing underwear. I changed her diaper this morning and after literally one minute of her wearing the diaper there was pee on my bed. This is the 3rd time this has happened. I thought it was due to my not putting them on correct but this time I know for a fact I put it on correct. And literally not even a minute later it leaked though the bottom. Save your money and try a different brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST DIAPERS EVER MADE!!!!
reviews.reviewText: I am a mother of 6 and I have been a mom for over 25 years and my youngest is 5 and I also have 4 grandkids from ages 5 down to newborn so my word is golden wisdom lol… and I came across these by chance whilst looking for a nighttime pull up for my autistic youngest and I seen these and loved they are eco friendly and no chemicals that typically are found in those other brands which cause my daughter to get a rash on her sides and bum! So i got these and the minute I felt the amazing softness and thickness of these I was blown away, then the real test was that she hasn’t had one single rash at all and these are seriously the most luxurious diapers ever and they’re the most gentle and earth friendly toss diapers you can buy, so buy them you’ll love ‘em!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Company began using bleach on diapers
reviews.reviewText: We have used dyper for about a year now and always were our number one choice due to clean ingredients and absorption for our 8 month old and pull ups for our toddler. Recently found out they began using bleach on their diapers. It’s a sad day when even a “clean” company begins using harmful ingredients for our little ones. Will no longer be ordering and switching Coterie Diapers due to actually being clean ingredients.
